attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this Government are serious about global warming why have they not banned the stand by facility on Televisions? I am always hearing about how much electricity is wasted when the T.V. is off but left on stand by so why are they allowing them to exist.How long would it take the foreign manafacturers to exclude them if they banned the import of Televisions with the stand by button? That is of course if they really were serious about saving energy
